name: reunification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an occasion when a country that was temporarily divided into smaller countries is joined together again as one country: the reunification of Germany

Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of joining two parts of something, esp. a country, that were previously divided: The reunification of Germany meant that East Germany no longer existed as a legal entity.
